author: GB News Reporter
title: Britain to send 10,000 ‘cutting-edge drones’ to Ukraine in major show of support
text: By [Mark White ](/presenters/mark-white) Published: 07/03/2024- 18:01 Updated: 07/03/2024- 18:40 Don't Miss Most Read Trending on GB News The UK is sending a further 10,000 military drones to Ukraine, as part of a massive ramping up of the embattled nation's drone capability. The announcement was made by UK Defence Secretary Grant Shapps, as he visited [Ukraine ](https://www.gbnews.com/news/world/russian-drone-nearly-kills-greek-prime-minister-zelensky-targeted)on Thursday, along with the Chief of the Defence Staff, Admiral Sir Tony Radakin. As part of the package, the UK will provide an extra £125million, in addition to a £200 million drone deal announced in January. The Defence Secretary said the extra investment would allow Ukraine to quickly boost its stocks of "cutting-edge drones to help fight Putin's illegal invasion." Grant Shapps announces Britain to send 10,000 ‘cutting-edge drones’ to Ukraine in major show of support PA/Getty Images The 10,000 new uncrewed platforms will be rolled out across 2024. The majority of the systems will be First-Person View (FPV) drones, which have already had a massive impact on the battlefield. The FPV drones can loiter over the battlefield and drop their munitions onto enemy armour or artillery emplacements with devastating impact. The enhanced military package will also provide Ukraine with 1,000 one-way attack drones, which have been researched and developed in the UK.LATEST DEVELOPMENTS: Grant Shapps visited Ukraine on Thursday PA Multiple surveillance and maritime drones are also being provided by Britain. Grant Shapps made the commitment to provide thousands of extra drones as met President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and Defence Minister Rustem Umerov on Thursday. Afterwards, Mr Shapps said: “I am ramping up our commitment to arm Ukraine with cutting-edge new drones coming directly from the UK’s world-leading defence industries – straight from the factory floor to the frontline. I encourage international partners to join the UK in this effort. "Ukraine’s Armed Forces are using UK donated weapons to unprecedented effect, to help lay waste to nearly 30 per cent of Russia’s Black Sea Fleet." Ukraine war: 10,000 ‘cutting-edge drones’ will be sent to help fight Russia PA In the early hours of Tuesday morning unmanned maritime attack drones, believed to have been supplied by the UK, destroyed a Russian patrol ship in the Black Sea. Video footage of the attack showed what appeared to be several maritime surface drones racing towards the Sergei Kotov, followed by large explosions. The vessel is reported to have sunk with at least a dozen Russian sailors reported dead or missing. Ukraine's armed forces have earned significant praise from Western allies for their highly effective use of different types of drones, destroying and damaging thousands of pieces of Russian equipment and vehicles. More than £100million of the £325million drone package is being spent on boosting Ukraine's maritime capabilities in the Black Sea. Today's announcement builds on a commitment by the UK and Latvia last month to lead a coalition of countries to bolster Ukraine's drone capabilities. Since the start of the war against Russia, the UK has committed more than £7billion of military support to help Ukraine. The UK has also helped train more than 60,000 Ukrainian recruits since the invasion of Crimea in 2014.

author: Daniela Urdaneta
title: La primer selfie con la que Gypsy Rose celebró su libertad
text: [Gypsy Rose Blanchard](https://www.nuevamujer.com/espectaculos/2023/12/28/gypsy-rose-blanchard-sale-de-prision-anos-despues-de-convencer-a-su-novio-de-que-matara-a-su-madre-abusiva/) ha captado la atención de muchos luego de salir de la cárcel tras siete años en prisión por haber asesinado a su madre Dee Dee Blanchard, quien la hizo creer que tenía distintas enfermedades crónicas, por lo que fue sometida a procedimientos innecesarios que la inhabilitaban. Ahora la joven de 32 años ha tenido una nueva oportunidad para insertarse dentro de la sociedad, y su caso ha generado un amplio debate en redes sociales entre quienes consideran que no debió estar presa por todo lo que la mujer la hizo sufrir y quienes opinan que puede ser un peligro por la manera en la que planeó su asesinato. Pese a que su sentencia era de 10 años, logró salir tres años antes de cumplirla y ahora ha presumido su libertad a través de su primera selfie en Instagram. El look y selfie de Gypsy Rose Blanchart tras salir de prisión Ante el apoyo que ha recibido Gypsy Rose Blanchard decidió abrir su cuenta en Instagram, donde se dejó ver por primera vez y ya cuenta con más de 2 millones de seguidores. “Primera selfie en libertad”, escribió junto a la imagen. En la postal se le puede ver usando un suéter blanco con degradado azul y aberturas en sus mangas, junto con un jeans casual, mientras posaba frente a un espejo con una gran sonrisa. Gypsy Rose también ha dado a conocer en al red social detalles de lo que será su docurserie ‘Las confesiones de prisión de Gypsy Rose Blanchard’ la cual contará con tres episodios que serán lanzados el 5,6 y 7 de enero de 2024 a través del canal de televisión Lifetime, por lo que su caso sigue causando gran conmoción e inquietud. Fueron varios años de su infancia los que su madre la sometió a tratamientos, cirugías, visitas médicas constantes que no necesitaba, ya que no estaba enferma. Actualmente, Gypsy está casada con un hombre llamado Ryan Scott Anderson y se conoce que el hombre con el que planeó la muerte de su madre sigue en prisión tras recibir como sentencia cadena perpetua. - Te recomendamos: [5 series de crímenes reales que puedes ver en Netflix](https://www.nuevamujer.com/espectaculos/2023/12/28/5-series-de-crimenes-reales-que-puedes-ver-en-netflix/) Junto a su ahora esposo ha sido captada dando paseos y muchos critican que ahora pretenda lucrarse con el crimen cometió contra su madre, pese a la horrible historia que fue sometida por sus mentiras. Y es que incluso su caso ya cuenta con una serie llamada The Act donde exponen cómo mató a su madre por mentirle y engañarla con falsas enfermedades. La producción es protagonizada por Joey King y Patricia Arquette quienes interpretan a Gypsy y Dee Dee respectivamente

author: 界面AI
title: 科创债ETF鹏华(551030)盘中上涨20bp！兼具政策红利与稳健收益机会|ETF_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
历经前几日的债市调整后，今日科创债ETF迎来反弹。截至2025年7月31日 11:15，科创债ETF鹏华(551030)上涨0.20%。
作为首批10只科创债ETF之一，科创债ETF鹏华（551030）跟踪 上证AAA科技创新公司债指数 ，该指数是从上交所上市的科技创新公司债中，选取主体评级AAA，隐含评级AA+及以上的债券作为成分券。该指数每月定期调整一次样本，能够较为准确地反映上交所中高等级科技创新公司债的整体表现。
科创债ETF具有信用风险较低的特性：一方面，当前科创债ETF对成分券均要求为主体评级AAA级的信用债，其信用资质较高，信用风险低，安全性相对更有保障。另一方面，科创债有政策背书，作为聚焦科技创新及战略性新兴产业的品种，今年以来政策持续聚焦科创债市场。
科创领域为当前国家关注的重点领域，其长期发展较为明确，国家政策也相对向其倾斜，2025年以来，科创债市场相关配套政策持续出台，推动科创债市场加速发展。后续，随科创债市场活跃度上升，有望推动其“政策溢价”向“市场共识溢价”转化，力争为投资者提供相对稳定的高票息回报机会。
相较于单券买入策略，科创债ETF具有低费率、低交易成本、透明度高、分散度高、“T+0”高效申赎等优势，有利于分散投资组合风险、提高资金使用效率。
鹏华基金自2018下半年建立“固收工具型产品”中长期战略，并在利率债指数产品及ETF、信用债指数、存单指数产品等方面积极布局，致力于打造固收工具库，力争成为国内“固收指数专家”，截至2024年末，固收工具型产品库包含9只产品，规模577亿。
债券ETF方面，鹏华基金目前布局了5年地债ETF（159972）、0-4地债ETF（159816），分别定位为中长久期债券ETF、类货币ETF工具，其中5年地债ETF是全市场规模最大的地方债ETF，流动性也位于市场前列。
凭借专业的债券指数投资管理能力和丰富的产品运作经验，鹏华基金将持续为投资者提供优质的债券指数化投资工具。

author: EFE
title: María Corina Machado dice que "no ha logrado" comunicarse con el gobierno mexicano | El Universal
text:
Buenos Aires.- La líder de la oposición venezolana , María Corina Machado , dijo este jueves que no ha podido comunicarse con el Gobierno de México, que junto al de Brasil y Colombia trabaja para encontrar una solución a la crisis desatada tras los comicios que, según los resultados oficiales, dieron ganador a Nicolás Maduro . "No he logrado tener comunicación con el Gobierno mexicano , a pesar de que lo hemos intentado", dijo Machado en una rueda de prensa virtual con medios de Argentina y Chile entre los que estaba EFE.
La líder antichavista sí dijo tener "comunicación permanente" con Colombia y Brasil, así como con Estados Unidos y países de Europa .
Lee también Jefe del Parlamento de Venezuela propone prohibir observadores internacionales en elecciones
"La posición de estos países es muy relevante porque son los países vecinos más claramente impactados por el conflicto venezolano y que históricamente han tenido vínculo con Maduro", dijo en referencia a Brasil y Colombia .
"No quiero especular. Agradezco los apoyos que se han hecho" para "que Maduro entre en razón y entienda" la necesidad de ir a una "transición ordenada", agregó.
Además, destacó que la represión y el uso de la fuerza "no es una opción sostenible", así como apresar periodistas o cortar las redes sociales.
Después de 6 días de brutal represión, creyeron que nos iban a callar, a parar o atemorizar… miren la respuesta.
Hoy, la presencia de que cada ciudadano en las calles de Venezuela demuestra la magnitud de la fuerza cívica que tenemos y la determinación de llegar hasta el… pic.twitter.com/O8u4EDcsSR
— María Corina Machado (@MariaCorinaYA) August 3, 2024 Lee también Biden dice que apoya la celebración de nuevas elecciones en Venezuela
Venezuela: Lula da Silva y Petro plantean diferentes salidas a la crisis postelectoral Maduro fue proclamado vencedor por el Consejo Nacional Electoral (CNE) de Venezuela, pero Machado insistió este jueves en "la victoria monumental" del opositor Edmundo González Urrutia con 7.3 millones de votos -casi el 84 % de las actas-, contra los 3.3 millones de votos que dijo obtuvo el líder chavista.
Brasil, Colombia y México han mantenido una postura pareja, sin reconocer a ningún ganador y pidiendo al Gobierno de Maduro las actas electorales, en tanto sus cancilleres dijeron que mantendrán sus consultas de "alto nivel", pero con pleno respeto a la "soberanía y la voluntad del pueblo venezolano".
El presidente brasileño, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva , sugirió este jueves dos posibles salidas a la crisis postelectoral en Venezuela: la formación de un Gobierno de coalición que integre miembros del chavismo y de la oposición o la celebración de nuevos comicios.
Lee también Exjefes de gobierno rechazan que México, Brasil y Colombia "toleren dictadura venezolana"
Por su parte, el presidente colombiano, Gustavo Petro , sugirió un "frente nacional" como el que hubo en su país en el siglo XX, en el que liberales y conservadores se turnaban el poder como paso "transitorio" hacia una "solución definitiva" a la crisis.
Ambas propuestas fueron rechazadas por Machado este jueves, al indicar que "la soberanía popular se respeta".
Por su parte, el presidente mexicano, Andrés Manuel López Obrador , expresó este jueves que no ve "prudente" pedir ahora nuevas elecciones en Venezuela como solución a la crisis y reiteró que la postura de México es esperar a que resuelva el tribunal electoral venezolano.
En el periodo neoliberal o neoporfirista, de 1983 a 2018, México era país de unos cuantos y para ellos el pueblo no existía. Conferencia matutina https://t.co/7zlNKRZP6E
— Andrés Manuel (@lopezobrador_) August 15, 2024 Lee también Viruela del mono: Suecia reporta primer caso de nueva subvariante de mpox
Machado señaló además que aspira que los "aliados de la democracia" ayuden a "hacerle entender" a Maduro que "facilite una transición ordenada".
"Muchos creen que Maduro está dejando pasar el tiempo para pasar la página", pero "eso no va a pasar", dijo la líder opositora, que cree que "Maduro ha perdido completamente su legitimidad" y que "esta ola represiva lo hace más tóxico".
Venezuela aprueba ley para regular ONG, que aseguran restringirá derechos civiles

author: financialcontent.com
title: Dallas Drainage Pros Expands Yard Drainage Services, Further Cementing Its Position in Dallas | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
Dallas Drainage Pros, a top player in stormwater drainage solutions, is thrilled to declare its expanded services. Now, the Dallas community can rely on it even more for comprehensive yard drainage solutions. The company is a highly-reputed provider among french drain installers in Dallas. The recognition derives from its consistent delivery of superior drainage services over the years. The company meticulously improves its processes to enable swift, efficient, and sustainable resolution of the community's flood-related issues.
John, a spokesperson from Dallas Drainage Pros, states, "By widening our services to include yard drainage, we demonstrate our commitment to delivering comprehensive stormwater solutions. We acknowledge the distinctiveness of the Dallas community and the geographical variations resulting in unique drainage challenges. Hence, our solutions are customised to meet the specific requirements of each site we work on."
The company broadens its services by including the installation of French drain systems. Experienced professionals at Dallas Drainage Pros adeptly design and install these systems that are effective in controlling water flow and averting water damages. The company's proficiency in this area reaffirms its position as the top french drain installers Dallas residents rely on. For an in-depth look at how French Drain System Installation can benefit your property, visit our website.
Besides French Drain installation, the company continues to deliver other services such as providing landscape lawn and yard drainage solutions, cleaning and repairing French drains, property grading, erosion control, creating swales for drainage, and sump pump cleaning and replacement services. Delve deeper into how we design and implement effective Landscape Lawn and Yard Drainage Solutions by checking our detailed service descriptions.
Dallas Drainage Pros uses a holistic approach, applying practical property grading techniques where the terrain of a client's property is altered to guide water away from their houses, thus thwarting likely water damage. If necessary, erosion control and the construction of swales, shallow trenches that enhance drainage, are introduced to reinforce properties' resistance against intense rain. Discover more on their approaches to Property Grading, Erosion Control and Swales for Drainage on their dedicated service pages.
John elaborates, "Each element of our service offerings targets a unique aspect of stormwater management. From installing new systems and repairing existing ones to grading properties and controlling erosion, we ensure homes stay comfortable, safe, and resilient, irrespective of the weather."
In addition to its enriched service offerings, Dallas Drainage Pros retains its dedication to its longstanding tradition of premium customer service. Transparency in communication and prompt project responses remain at the heart of all the work they undertake. Clients can avail of round-the-clock support, keeping them updated and secured at each stage of their projects.
The development of services also indicates the company's determination to persist in delivering exceptional value through its superior solutions and unmatched service. Dallas Drainage Pros leads in stormwater management in Dallas, offering effective, eco-friendly solutions, ensuring a flood-free and flourishing local community.
John concludes, "Our quest to excel is driven by our dedication to protecting our community’s properties from flood damage. We aim for nothing less than exemplary services, customer satisfaction, and a sustainable environment for today's families and future generations."
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ITpaeNyiHHY
Dallas Drainage Pros is committed to becoming the premier stormwater solution provider and the most dependable french drain installers Dallas residents depend on. Through these endeavors, the company strengthens its position in contributing towards a safer and flood-free future for the community. Explore their suite of drainage solutions, including their Custom Channel Drains service, which is tailored to meet the needs of properties facing heavy water flow challenges.
###

author: yahoo
title: Spotting Anxiety in Kids: Tips from a Child Therapist - Motherly
text:
Home / News / Viral & Trending
This therapist and mom posted a viral video about the different ways kids express anxiety—and it is SPOT ON She also posted a follow-up video with tips for managing anxiety.
By Diva Anwari January 7, 2024
momtherapist/ TikTok
How does your child express their nervousness? If they’re experiencing first day of school jitters , they might tell you how scared they are to be going to school. But, what if your child doesn’t express themselves in a clear way? Well, there might be a way to read between the lines.
A therapist’s TikTok video is going viral for all of the ways she says that parents can spot anxiety in their kids. Melissa Griffing is the mom and child therapist behind the TikTok account, @momtherapist . Her video points out 15 things kids say that can point to anxiety and PEOPLE FEEL SEEN. From adults who remember saying all of these in their childhood to parents who are hearing it from their kids now—there’s a reason the video has racked up more than a million views!
@momtherapist Kids tall about anxiety in ways adulta often dont pick up on. Heres your cheat sheet for deciphering kid speak on anxiety! #therapy #childtherapists #thoughtsfromatherapist #wellnestcounseling #dallastherapist #parenting #4upage
♬ original sound – Melissa Griffing is a mom to three boys. She starts the video by saying, “Did you know kids talk about anxiety in a whole heck of a bunch of different ways that parents often don’t pick up on? Here are 15 different ways that kids say, ‘I’m feeling worried.'”
The first one is something I’m sure every parent has heard. You might have even heard it today—”My tummy hurts.”
Yes, kids complain about tummy aches all of the time. Especially if you’ve got a picky eater on your hands that’s trying to wriggle themselves out of dinner! Because a lot of the phrases Griffing mentions in her list are common, everyday sentences most kids might use, the mother of three makes it clear in the comments that you should always check with your child’s doctor.
Other ways your kids might be expressing anxiety include: “What if…,” “I need to pee again” and “I just want to stay with you.”
Related: How to ease your toddler’s separation anxiety: 5 tips to better attachment
Over the in comments, people are sharing how much this video resonated with them.
“Damn my daughter has said every single one of these. Especially the sick thing”
“‘My stomach hurts’ was my son. On those days I kept him home from school and I called off work. When he was older I told him I knew it was anxiety so”
“My baby every day, and as a mom with anxiety, I was so worried that I would pass this to her”
“by the time you hit number 9 I was in tears.”
“As a kid I definitely had anxiety & didn’t understand it. So I always try to help my son cope when I can tell he’s anxious. Hoping it helps him later”
Related: Let’s give it up for the mom who fakes homemade lunches for her kid’s daycare
Griffing also posted follow-up videos with tips on how to help your child manage their anxiety where she points out, “The first step in helping your kids to manage their anxiety is to help them understand what they’re feeling when they’re feeling it—which means you have to recognize that they’re anxious.”
@momtherapist Helping your kids manage their own anxiety part one. #therapy #childtherapists #tipsfromatherapist #dallastherapist #parenting #thewellcounseling
♬ original sound – Melissa A version of this post was published in July 2023. It has been updated.

author: SFGate - Stephen Council
title: Bay Area tech CEO lays off 931 workers with 'straight facts' email | Flipboard
text:
Bay Area tech CEO lays off 931 workers with 'straight facts' email Jack Dorsey told Block staff they were being laid off in an all-lowercase email on Tuesday Block, the Bay Area tech giant behind Square, Cash App and Afterpay, is abruptly laying off 931 workers, according to an email from CEO Jack Dorsey to workers on Tuesday. More than 200 of the employees worked …
SFGate - Stephen Council • 7h
